name: Roseblight (Chapter 1 Demo)
description:
Roseblight, also known as Project Trowel, is a Strategy/Action RPG about an individual who wears a pair of overalls and goes on a journey up a mountain.


"There is... something... that flows between all of us. You can feel it too, can't you? Spirit, Life, Magic, whatever you call it... it's there. It binds us all together in a way. We're all made of it. But some... some can conjure it. Mold it, shape it, change the universe with it. I fear those who can."

Roseblight takes place on a distant planet called Ahokau, a monochromatic world filled with deadly monsters, vast uncharted territory, and mysterious natural phenomena. When venturing off into the wilderness and facing against mighty foes, you'll need a strategic outlook to avoid harm's way. With a solid battle plan, some reliable equipment, and an unlocked understanding of what you're made of, nothing will stand in your way.

SCREENSHOTS

CREDITS

This game was made all by myself; I did the programming, artwork, level design, and music. I have been working on this game for about 10 months now, and may or may not continue working on it in the future. This project is not funded whatsoever.
